Dear Mr. Villian,

I’m writing you concerning a certain product advertised on your website. The product in question is:

ULTRA-BUDGET MAN TRAP Evil On A Budget, Inc. presents the Ultra-Budget Man Trap Kit. Just dig a hole*, place these sharpened spikes in the bottom, and cover the hole with loose branches. You have a deadly trap in just minutes! Price: US$29.49 (Save 20%!) * hole not included

The hole isn’t included?? For $29.49, I would think the hole must be included. Now I have to pay $29.49 for a product with no hole, and I have to make a separate purchase for a shovel.

I think this product should be re-evaluated.

Thank you for your time,
Linda B. Wilson
